schema.description: A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

items.description: A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.
A bidirectional connection between two pieces of a design.

rotation.description: The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

tilt.description: The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

gap.description: The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.

shift.description: The optional lateral shift (applied after rotation and tilt in the plane) between the connected and the connecting piece..
